title: BRIEF-Mobilezone: Subscription Rights For 99.9 Pct Of Shares Offered Were Exercised
text: March 23, 2018 / 5:15 PM / Updated 10 hours ago BRIEF-Mobilezone: Subscription Rights For 99.9 Pct Of Shares Offered Were Exercised Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 23 (Reuters) - MOBILEZONE AG: * SAYS SUBSCRIPTION RIGHTS FOR 8,573,352 NEW REGISTERED SHARES HAVE BEEN EXERCISED BY END OF SUBSCRIPTION PERIOD * THIS IS EQUIVALENT TO 99.9 PERCENT OF TOTAL 8,585,516 REGISTERED SHARES OFFERED IN RIGHTS OFFERING * SAYS WILL RECEIVE GROSS PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY CHF 81.6 MILLION FROM CAPITAL INCREASE * SAYS ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL WILL INCREASE BY CHF 85,855.16 TO CHF 407,812.13 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
